PackageOracle.name: DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.24.527798000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,scheduled_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,closed_captioned_ind IN VARCHAR2
,program_audio_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,program_color_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,program_airing_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,aspect_ratio_desc IN VARCHAR2
,letter_box_style_cd IN VARCHAR2
,syndicated_flag IN VARCHAR2
,resolution_desc IN VARCHAR2
,part_num IN VARCHAR2
,of_total_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_video_program;

body.name: DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.24.538304000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,scheduled_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,closed_captioned_ind IN VARCHAR2
,program_audio_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,program_color_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,program_airing_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,aspect_ratio_desc IN VARCHAR2
,letter_box_style_cd IN VARCHAR2
,syndicated_flag IN VARCHAR2
,resolution_desc IN VARCHAR2
,part_num IN VARCHAR2
,of_total_part_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_video_program.add, parms=' || video_program_id || '|' || scheduled_program_id || '|' || closed_captioned_ind || '|' || program_audio_type_cd || '|' || program_color_type_cd || '|' || program_airing_type_cd || '|' || aspect_ratio_desc || '|' || letter_box_style_cd || '|' || syndicated_flag || '|' || resolution_desc || '|' || part_num || '|' || of_total_part_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_video_program a
(
a.video_program_id
,a.scheduled_program_id
,a.closed_captioned_ind
,a.program_audio_type_cd
,a.program_color_type_cd
,a.program_airing_type_cd
,a.aspect_ratio_desc
,a.letter_box_style_cd
,a.syndicated_flag
,a.resolution_desc
,a.part_num
,a.of_total_part_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.video_program_id
,add.scheduled_program_id
,add.closed_captioned_ind
,add.program_audio_type_cd
,add.program_color_type_cd
,add.program_airing_type_cd
,add.aspect_ratio_desc
,add.letter_box_style_cd
,add.syndicated_flag
,add.resolution_desc
,add.part_num
,add.of_total_part_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_video_program.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_video_program.del, parms=' || video_program_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_video_program a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.video_program_id = del.video_program_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_video_program.del');

END del;

END da_video_program;
